text:
Are the producers of the upcoming live-action Barbie movie getting angry with Anne Hathaway ’s alleged demands about the project? That’s the claim in one of this week’s new tabloids, but Gossip Cop has the truth. It was announced last month that Hathaway is in talks to star in Sony Pictures’ Barbie movie after Amy Schumer […]
